change.changenote: Regulation title BEFORE amended by BC Reg 133/2018, effective July 1, 2018.
change.title: Low Income Climate Action Tax Credit Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2010, effective January 29, 2010.

paragraph.paragraphtext: in respect of a specified month for the 2008 taxation year, $105.

change.changenote: Section 2 (2) (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2010, effective January 29, 2010.

paragraph.paragraphtext: in respect of a specified month for the 2008 taxation year, $31.50.

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) (c) and 2 (2) (c) were added by BC Reg 183/2010, effective June 25, 2010.
Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 17/2017, effective February 20, 2018.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Prescribed amounts for low income climate action tax credit

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The amount prescribed for the purposes of paragraphs (a) to (c) of the description of "total credits" in section 8.1 (3) of the Act is

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: in respect of a specified month for the 2007 taxation year, $100,
in respect of a specified month for the 2008 and 2009 taxation years, $105, and
in respect of a specified month for the 2010 and subsequent taxation years, $115.50.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The amount prescribed for the purposes of paragraph (d) of the description of "total credits" in section 8.1 (3) of the Act is

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: in respect of a specified month for the 2007 taxation year, $30,
in respect of a specified month for the 2008 and 2009 taxation years, $31.50, and
in respect of a specified month for the 2010 and subsequent taxation years, $34.50.

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) (c) and (d) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 118/2019, effective June 5, 2019.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: in respect of a specified month for the 2010 to 2016 taxation years, other than the specified month of April 2018, $115.50, and
in respect of the specified month of April 2018 or a specified month for the 2017 and subsequent taxation years, $135.

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) (e) to (g) were added by BC Reg 118/2019, effective June 5, 2019.
Section 2 (2) (c) and (d) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 118/2019, effective June 5, 2019.
